MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 9:17pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:52pm on 30th March 2021
